info.title: Asset
info.description:
Theme assets are the individual files that make up a shop's theme.

{{ '/api/reference/asset.png' | image }}

A theme's assets include its templates, images, stylesheets, and extra snippets of code. They are arranged among the theme's directories, such as layout, templates, and assets. You can use the Asset resource to add, change, or remove asset files from a shop's theme. For a complete list of theme directories, refer to Theme architecture.

To learn how to create your own theme, see Building themes.

paths.description:
Retrieves a list of assets for a theme.

Note: Retrieving a list of assets returns only metadata about each asset. To retrieve an asset's content, you need to retrieve the asset individually.
paths.summary: Retrieves a list of assets for a theme

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify which fields to show using a comma-separated list of field names.

200.description: Retrieves a list of assets for a theme

x-examples.name: Retrieve a list of all assets for a theme

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::Asset.all(
  session: test_session,
  theme_id: 828155753,
)

paths.description:
Creates or updates an asset for a theme.

In the PUT request, you can include the src or source_key property to create the asset from an existing file.
paths.summary: Creates or updates an asset for a theme

parameters.name: source_key
parameters.description: The path within the theme to an existing asset. Include in the body of the PUT request to create a duplicate asset.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: The source URL of an image. Include in the body of the PUT request to upload the image to Shopify.

200.description: Creates or updates an asset for a theme

request.body:
{"asset":{"key":"templates/index.liquid","value":"

We are busy updating the store for you and will be back within the hour.

"}}

x-examples.name: Change an existing Liquid template's value

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"asset":{"key":"templates/index.liquid","value":"

We are busy updating the store for you and will be back within the hour.

"}}' \ -X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json" \ -H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session( auth_header: request.auth_header, cookies: request.cookies, ) asset = ShopifyAPI::Asset.new(session: test_session) asset.theme_id = 828155753 asset.key = "templates/index.liquid" asset.value = "

We are busy updating the store for you and will be back within the hour.

" asset.save!

x-examples.name: Create an image asset by providing a base64-encoded attachment

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"asset":{"key":"assets/empty.gif","attachment":"R0lGODlhAQABAPABAP///wAAACH5BAEKAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==\n"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

asset = ShopifyAPI::Asset.new(session: test_session)
asset.theme_id = 828155753
asset.key = "assets/empty.gif"
asset.attachment = "R0lGODlhAQABAPABAP///wAAACH5BAEKAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==\n"
asset.save!

x-examples.name: Create an image asset by providing a source URL from which to upload the image

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"asset":{"key":"assets/bg-body.gif","src":"http://example.com/new_bg.gif"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

asset = ShopifyAPI::Asset.new(session: test_session)
asset.theme_id = 828155753
asset.key = "assets/bg-body.gif"
asset.src = "http://example.com/new_bg.gif"
asset.save!

x-examples.name: Duplicate an existing asset by providing a source key

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"asset":{"key":"layout/alternate.liquid","source_key":"layout/theme.liquid"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

asset = ShopifyAPI::Asset.new(session: test_session)
asset.theme_id = 828155753
asset.key = "layout/alternate.liquid"
asset.source_key = "layout/theme.liquid"
asset.save!

paths.description:
Retrieves a single asset for a theme by its key.

To retrieve a single asset, include asset[key]=#{asset_key} as a request parameter. For example, to retrieve the asset with a key of templates/index.liquid, the request might be /admin/themes/828155753/assets.json?asset[key]=templates/index.liquid.

For more information on the key property, refer to Asset properties.
paths.summary: Retrieves a single asset for a theme

parameters.name: asset[key]
parameters.description: Retrieves a single asset for a theme by specifying the asset's key.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify which fields to show using a comma-separated list of field names.

200.description: Retrieves a single asset for a theme

asset.value:
Featured Products

{% tablerow product in collections.frontpage.products cols:3 %} {{ product.featured_image | product_img_url: 'small' | img_tag }}

{{product.title}}

  • {{product.price_min | money}}
{% endtablerow %}
{{ content_for_index }}
{% assign article = pages.frontpage %}
{% if article.content != "" %}

{{ article.title }}

{{ article.content }}
{% else %}
In Admin > Blogs & Pages, create a page with the handle frontpage and it will show up here.
{{ "Learn more about handles" | link_to "http://wiki.shopify.com/Handle" }}
{% endif %}

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json?asset%5Bkey%5D=templates%2Findex.liquid" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::Asset.all(
  session: test_session,
  theme_id: 828155753,
  asset: {"key" => "templates/index.liquid"},
)

paths.description: Deletes an asset from a theme.
paths.summary: Deletes an asset from a theme

parameters.name: asset[key]
parameters.description: Deletes a single asset from a theme by specifying the asset's key.

200.description: Deletes an asset from a theme

403.description: Deletes an asset from a theme

x-examples.name: Delete an image from a theme

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X DELETE "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json?asset%5Bkey%5D=assets%2Fbg-body.gif" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::Asset.delete(
  session: test_session,
  theme_id: 828155753,
  asset: {"key" => "assets/bg-body.gif"},
)

x-examples.name: Deleting an asset required by the theme fails with an error

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X DELETE "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/themes/828155753/assets.json?asset%5Bkey%5D=layout%2Ftheme.liquid" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::Asset.delete(
  session: test_session,
  theme_id: 828155753,
  asset: {"key" => "layout/theme.liquid"},
)

properties.description: The MD5 representation of the content, consisting of a string of 32 hexadecimal digits. May be null if an asset has not been updated recently.
properties.name: checksum

properties.description: The MIME representation of the content, consisting of the type and subtype of the asset.
properties.name: content_type

properties.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the asset was created.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: The path to the asset within a theme. It consists of the file's directory and filename. For example, the asset assets/bg-body-green.gif is in the assets directory, so its key is assets/bg-body-green.gif.
properties.name: key

properties.description: The public-facing URL of the asset.
properties.name: public_url

properties.description: The ID for the theme that an asset belongs to.
properties.name: theme_id

properties.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when an asset was last updated.
properties.name: updated_at

properties.description: The text content of the asset, such as the HTML and Liquid markup of a template file.
properties.example:
404 Page not found

We couldn't find the page you were looking for.
properties.name: value

x-shopify-meta.meta_description: Manage the files that make up a store's theme to change the look of the online store.
